episodes.title: Terrier-Stricken/Dog Gone South/Devil May Hare
episodes.plot: Bugs introduces Porky Pig as the host for the show. Porky is pestered by Charlie Dog, who is looking for a master.

episodes.title: The Windblown Hare/Don't Give Up the Sheep/Stooge for a Mouse
episodes.plot: After starring in a cartoon as the temporary straw-and-wood-house-buying dupe of Three wolf-wary and dishonest Little Pigs, Bugs lectures about dogs, but first must struggle with a projectionist.

episodes.title: Barbary-Coast Bunny/Henhouse Henery/Canned Feud
episodes.plot: Bugs Bunny introduces the host for this show, Pepe Le Pew, who is in an apartment in Paris.

episodes.title: Hare We Go/A Waggily Tale/Just Plane Beep
episodes.plot: Wile E. Coyote's chase of the Road Runner has extended into the studio where Bugs is trying to host his television show.

episodes.title: Dr. Devil and Mr. Hare/Who's Kitten Who?/Heaven Scent
episodes.plot: Desperate to appear on the show as the feature performer, Daffy dresses as a Hawaiian, a musketeer, and a knight, but his costume is deemed inappropriate by Bugs for each cartoon about to commence.

episodes.title: Mad as a Mars Hare/Tweety's S.O.S./Chaser On the Rocks
episodes.plot: In a musical competition between cartoon features of Bugs at war with an opera singer, Sylvester buffeted by tidal waves in his gastronomic quest for Tweety.

episodes.title: No Parking Hare/Mississippi Hare/Little Beau Pepé
episodes.plot: Daffy disguises himself as Bugs to host the television show, but a sheepdog, on a day free from his work, walks into the studio, hoping to catch the bunny-rabbit (Bugs) that he saw on television on the previous week.

episodes.title: A-Lad-in His Lamp/The Hasty Hare/Hare-Way to the Stars
episodes.plot: Daffy wants to be host. So, he banishes all others from the stage, including Pepe, Elmer, and Bugs.

episodes.title: Bully For Bugs/Two's a Crowd/Big House Bunny
episodes.plot: Tweety is host of an installment containing two psychological thrillers with birds seemingly doomed to death at a specified time.

episodes.title: High Diving Hare/Lovelorn Leghorn/Little Boy Boo
episodes.plot: Yosemite Sam wants Bugs' hide. So, gun in hand, he comes to see The Bugs Bunny Show live as a spectator in the studio.

episodes.title: Scent-imental Romeo/The Cat's Bah/Frigid Hare
episodes.plot: Bugs introduces Porky Pig as host. Porky is pestered by Charlie Dog, who is looking for a master.

episodes.title: Transylvania 6-5000/Each Dawn I Crow/One Froggy Evening
episodes.plot: George P. Dog is introduced by Bugs, but Foghorn Leghorn decides that he would be a better emcee and pushes the dog aside.

episodes.title: A Fractured Leghorn/High Note/Hot Cross Bunny
episodes.plot: Bugs Bunny is a science research test subject for the switching of his brain with a chicken. He finds himself in front of an audience in a lab auditorium and decides to entertain them with impersonations, magic tricks, dancing and skat-singing.
